title: AGI-25: The 18th Annual AGI Conference
description: The frontier of mind and machine is closer than ever. Join the world’s leading researchers at AGI-25, where ideas, architectures, and insights collide to advance the future of thinking machines.

title: Conscious AI Meetup: Persona and personality of AI models
description: ​What is the nature of personality, and how can we instill personality into AI models? Can we use machine psychology to deduce more about human personality? How does personality relate to emotion and motivation? Roshni Lulla, Janus and Joscha Bach will present some of their work and thoughts on the topic.
